author: jstrachan
msg: renamed the old hand-crafted build.xml to build-legacy.xml and included the auto-generated build.xml from Maven

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied the close() code to ensure things should always tidy themselves up nicely when a Messenger gets closed, even if some wierd exception occurs during the close process

author: jstrachan
msg: ensured that close() will actually clear the connection

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patches from Michael Rimov for JBoss and OpenJMS configuration files as well as DTDs for messenger.xml and subscriptions.xml.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the StopWatchMessageListener so that it takes an optional MessageListener. So now StopWatchMessageListener is a sample consumer that just logs the throughput rate that it consumes messages.
Also fixed the incorrect package name.
Added a <stopWatch/> element to the subscribe.xml format so that its easy to consume XML messages.
